price: Ka sε: “Enti moregye yεn akyinnye wͻ Nyankopͻn ho aberε a Ɔne yεn Wura, εna Ɔno ara nso ne mo Wura? Yεn nyuma (ho akatua) wͻ yεn, εna monso mon’yuma (ho akatua) wͻ mo, na Nyankopͻn na yede yɛho ma no nokorɛ mu.
arabic: قُلۡ أَتُحَآجُّونَنَا فِي ٱللَّهِ وَهُوَ رَبُّنَا وَرَبُّكُمۡ وَلَنَآ أَعۡمَٰلُنَا وَلَكُمۡ أَعۡمَٰلُكُمۡ وَنَحۡنُ لَهُۥ مُخۡلِصُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qul atuḥājjūnanā fī al-lahi wahuwa rabbunā warabbukum walanā aʿmālunā walakum aʿmālukum wanaḥnu lahu mukh'liṣūna
